items.title: Hotfix
items.description: My biggest and most time-consuming Javascript project to date. It took me all of 2019 and early 2020 to develop. It's a game built using various web technologies - Phaser 3, nw.js, React, Howler, greenworks and many, many more.

items.title: ClanWars GO
items.description: MERN stack game project using Google Maps and geolocation APIs to create an experience similiar to games such as Pokemon GO. Has some unfinished work though (more in the repo)

items.title: react-minesweeper
items.description: The classic minesweeper game written as a React component. Made for fun :).

items.title: ERB Webcam
items.description: Webcam desktop app based on electron-react-boilerplate made to test out Electron and its auto-update functionality of electron-builder with Github releases

items.title: egzaminy-prawo-jazdy
items.description: Web app containing most of the official Polish driving exam questions to help future drivers test their skills.

items.title: egzaminy-technik-informatyk
items.description: PWA web app created to help me and other students study computer science.

items.title: WebStickyNotes
items.description: Mongo, Express, SSR React, Node, Next.js single page application for creating sticky notes in the browser stored in localStorage with the ability to share them and download others by using a custom URL. The UI was made with React-UWP.

items.title: heheobrazki
items.description: Node, Express, Bootstrap 4 web app to browse and publish pictures that can be commented on and upvoted. Also an unnecessary socket.io chat tacked on just for the sake of it.

items.title: nie-wiem-wlasnie-o-co-chodzi
items.description: Soundboard made for my school friends. It shouldn't even be mentioned here, don't click it!

items.title: Virtus Dashboard
items.description: One of my first React apps. However, in this project I focused more on the design rather than learning the React way of writing code.

items.title: Perth
items.description: Old website created from a PSD file. It's so old I didn't even commit the source to Github

items.title: repetitive.js
items.description: A documentation page created for my old JS library.

items.title: parcel-boilerplate-pwa
items.description: A demo page for my Parcel bundler boilerplate.
